name: @SSwarper
author: AFNI Developers
description: Dual purposes for processing a given subject's anatomical volume: skull-strip the brain and calculate the warp to a reference template/standard space.

inputs.description: An anatomical dataset, not skull-stripped, with about 1 mm resolution.
inputs.name: Input anatomical dataset

inputs.description: A base template dataset with similar contrast to the input dataset.
inputs.name: Base template dataset

inputs.description: Name code for output datasets (e.g., 'sub007').
inputs.name: Subject ID

inputs.description: Output directory for all files from this program.
inputs.name: Output directory

inputs.description: Minimum patch size on final 3dQwarp.
inputs.name: Minimum patch size

inputs.description: Do not use the '-lite' option with 3dQwarp.
inputs.name: No lite

inputs.description: Do not compute past the output of anatSS.<subid>.nii.
inputs.name: Skip warp

inputs.description: Do not start with a 3dUnifize command.
inputs.name: Unifize off

inputs.description: Do not preprocess with a 3dSkullstrip command.
inputs.name: Init skullstrip off

inputs.description: Do not make extra QC images.
inputs.name: Extra QC off

inputs.description: Just make the two QC*jpg images from a previous run.
inputs.name: Jump to extra QC

inputs.description: Specify cost function for initial nonlinear (3dQwarp) part of alignment.
inputs.name: Initial nonlinear alignment cost function

inputs.description: Specify cost function for final nonlinear (3dQwarp) parts of alignment.
inputs.name: Final nonlinear alignment cost function

inputs.description: Apply obliquity information to deoblique the input volume.
inputs.name: Deoblique

inputs.description: Purge obliquity information to deoblique the input volume.
inputs.name: Deoblique refitly

inputs.description: Control flexibility of warps in 3dQwarp.
inputs.name: Warp scale

inputs.description: Append a string of options for 3dSkullStrip.
inputs.name: 3dSkullStrip options

inputs.description: Do not preprocess with a 3danisosmooth command.
inputs.name: Aniso off

inputs.description: Turn off capping on values after anisosmoothing.
inputs.name: Ceil off

inputs.description: Use nicer, non-random intermediate file prefix for temporary files.
inputs.name: Temporary file naming

inputs.description: Run the script with 'set echo' for extra verbosity in the terminal output.
inputs.name: Echo flag

inputs.description: Apply the '-verb' option to 3dQwarp for verbose progress information.
inputs.name: Verbose flag

inputs.description: Do not delete the 'junk' files at the end of computations.
inputs.name: No clean flag

output-files.description: Anisotropically smoothed version of the uniformized dataset
output-files.name: Anisotropically Smoothed Dataset

output-files.description: Ceiling-capped version of the anisotropically smoothed dataset
output-files.name: Ceiling-capped Dataset

output-files.description: Skull-stripped dataset nonlinearly warped to the base template space
output-files.name: Nonlinearly Warped Dataset

output-files.description: Affine matrix to transform original dataset to base template space
output-files.name: Affine Transformation Matrix

output-files.description: Incremental warp from affine transformation to nonlinearly aligned dataset
output-files.name: Incremental Warp

output-files.description: 3x3 snapshot image of the nonlinearly warped dataset with edges from the base template overlaid
output-files.name: AM Snapshot

output-files.description: Similar to AM_snapshot, but with roles of the template and anatomical dataset reversed
output-files.name: MA Snapshot

output-files.description: 3 rows of 8 slices snapshot image for checking alignment
output-files.name: QC anatQQ Snapshot

output-files.description: Snapshot image to check skullstripping in original space
output-files.name: QC anatSS Snapshot

output-files.description: Montage to check initial overlap of source and base datasets
output-files.name: Initial Overlap QC
